attributes.action: Provide financial and technical intervention to reduce UK port congestion.
attributes.additional_details:
Financial compensation or tax relief for affected importers
Provide container storage locations near ports to allow overflow of full and empty containers (rather than have containers sat on ships waiting to be unloaded)
Implement measures to hold Port authorities to account rather than continually pass blame and charges on
attributes.background: Provide financial compensation to importers suffering from dramatically increased freight rates and intervene with industry controls to restrict shipping companies continually increasing prices and to provide advice/support to reduce port congestion.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Some of the requests in your petition would be operational matters for the port authorities or owners, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We could accept a petition calling for funding to ease port congestion, if this is something you would like to see happen.
